oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cairo Muhammadan Monuments
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Egypt. Maṣlaḥat al-Misāḥah
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Shows mosque locations, names of streets, government and tourist buildings, and other points of interest. Appears in: Masājid Miṣr min sanat 21 ilá sanat 1365 H (sanat 641 ilá sanat 1946 M) : majmūʻah min al-manāẓir al-mulawwanah wa-ghayr al-mulawwanah li-ahamm al-masājid fī Miṣr maʻa nubdhah tārīkhīyah li-kull minhā maṣḥūbah bi-masāqiṭ wa-qiṭāʻāt handasīyah. [Cairo] : al-Mamlakah al-Miṣrīyah, Wizārat al-Awqāf ; al-Jīzah : Taṣmīm wa-ṭabʻ Maṣlaḥat al-Misāḥah al-Miṣrīyah, [1954?] Index title: Fihris al-Athār al-Islāmīyah bi-madīnat al-Qāhirah.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cairo (Egypt) -- Maps; Egypt -- Antiquities -- Maps; Islamic antiquities -- Egypt -- Cairo -- Maps
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; the American University in Cairo
